author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:

In a recent publication, a team of physicists showed that the electric and magnetic interactions are purely geometric and can therefore be unified with gravity, opening a new path to a theory of everything. I’ve had a look at the paper… 

Paper: https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1742-6596/2987/1/012001

title: New theory explains electric force as part of gravity (allegedly)
